i enjoy playing retro video games on my 386.

in my freetime i enjoy cloud watching.
I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.

i have a collection of video games.
I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade.
I remember helping my mom bake cupcakes in the kitchen when I was a kid.

content.text: Pretty good, I'm just working on some art. What are you up to?
I'm just playing some video games.
Cool, what games do you like?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorites are probably the Mario games.
Oh, I love Mario games too! I've been playing a lot of Super Mario Odyssey lately.
Me too! That game is so good. I love the new capture mechanic.
Yeah, it's really cool. I love being able to control other characters in the game.
I know, right? It's so much fun.
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to read, watch movies, and go rollerblading.
Cool, I like to read and watch movies too. I've never been rollerblading, though.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and have fun at the same time.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
